check.name: UnnecessaryNullCheckWithInstanceOf
check.description:
Checks for unnecessary null checks when used in conjunction with the instanceof operator. The instanceof operator already returns false for null values, making an explicit null check redundant.

Example of an unnecessary null check: 

 if (obj != null && obj instanceof String) {
     // do something
 }

Recommended approach: 

 if (obj instanceof String) {
     // do something
 }

This check helps simplify and clean up conditional expressions.
